instructions: put the charger in the bottom center side of the table
put the dinner fork on the left side of the charger
put the dinner knife on the right side of the charger
put the salad fork on the left side of the dinner fork
put the salad knife on the right side of the dinner knife
put the soup spoon on the right side of the salad knife
put the dessert spoon on the top side of the charger with the bowl pointing left
put the dessert fork between the dessert spoon and the charger with the prongs pointing right
put the bread plate above the forks
put the butter knife on the bread plate diagonally with blade pointing top left
put the water glass above the knifes
put the napkin on the plate
